docs.snippet: Stanley Hummel, pianist from Albany, gave his fifth New York recital last night at Town Hall. Mr. Hummel's technical dexterity has reached the virtuoso stage of development and enabled him to accomplish much that was effectively brilliant wherever...
docs.lead_paragraph: Stanley Hummel, pianist from Albany, gave his fifth New York recital last night at Town Hall. Mr. Hummel's technical dexterity has reached the virtuoso stage of development and enabled him to accomplish much that was effectively brilliant wherever his list called for bravura playing.

headline.main: MUSIC; Stanley Hummel Is Heard Munz Gives Piano Recital
Article 1 -- No Title; A Summer Setting

docs.snippet: STRUMMING on his most melodious guitar, singing and talking in his best Spanish and Portuguese, Uncle Sam now sits at microphones north of the Rio Grande serenading for long hours of the day and night his twenty-one sovereign neighbors in the far...
docs.lead_paragraph: STRUMMING on his most melodious guitar, singing and talking in his best Spanish and Portuguese, Uncle Sam now sits at microphones north of the Rio Grande serenading for long hours of the day and night his twenty-one sovereign neighbors in the far south. About a year ago he discovered that he as a friendly neighbor should do the serenading and not leave it entirely to aggressive Europeans.

docs.snippet: The flow of mail and passengers to foreign countries for Christmas is now in its final week. InIcluding the Cunarder Aquitania, which sailed yesterday, seven liners will have departed by the end of the week with almost 5,000 passengers and...
docs.lead_paragraph: The flow of mail and passengers to foreign countries for Christmas is now in its final week. InIcluding the Cunarder Aquitania, which sailed yesterday, seven liners will have departed by the end of the week with almost 5,000 passengers and approximately 35,000 sacks of mail.

headline.main: YULE MAIL RUSH ENTERS FINAL WEEK; Seven Liners to Depart During Period With 35,000 Sacks and 5,000 Voyagers AQUITANIA LEADS PARADE Queen Mary Will Sail Friday, Marking the Close of the Busy Season

docs.snippet: A convention to guarantee to the women of the Western Hemisphere full rights to vote and to hold public office, which already exist among 80 per cent of its population. has been recommended to the Pan American Conference by the Inter-American...
docs.lead_paragraph: A convention to guarantee to the women of the Western Hemisphere full rights to vote and to hold public office, which already exist among 80 per cent of its population. has been recommended to the Pan American Conference by the Inter-American Commission of Women in the first formal report it has presented since the seventh Pan-American Conference at Montevideo five years ago.
